body:
I'm not convinced this is a good idea.

In an ideal world, shouldn't we end up with an include structure where non-Python-using headers never include `Python.h` (transitively), and Python-using headers include `Python.h` at their header. In this case, shouldn't this workaround not be necessary?
body_html:
